external_games.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Storm of Celestus

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Storm of Celestus
summary: Drakan Celestus, accompanied by his loyal gryph-hound and an elite retinue of Castigators, is tasked with the investigation of the curse that has taken hold of the city of Shadespire. Unlock this warband and play as Storm of Celestus in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.
